abstract: In a letter to Illumina’s shareholders, Roche’s chief executive, Severin Schwan, said there were few parallels between the iPhone maker and the genetic analysis provider, despite statements from the board that suggest otherwise.
snippet: In a letter to Illumina’s shareholders, Roche’s chief executive, Severin Schwan, said there were few parallels between the iPhone maker and the genetic analysis provider, despite statements from the board that suggest otherwise.
lead_paragraph: If honey doesn’t work, try a well-timed sting.
